label.description: The text label for the input field. This can be a literal string or a reference to a value in the data model ('path, e.g. '/user/name').

text.description: The value of the text field. This can be a literal string or a reference to a value in the data model ('path', e.g. '/user/name').

textFieldType.description: The type of input field to display.

validationRegexp.description: A regular expression used for client-side validation of the input.
